root.name: Claw
root.description: As feline pirate Captain Nathaniel Claw, you must use your sword, pistol, dynamite, and magic to escape from prison and track down a hidden treasure.Claw was referenced in Monolith's next game, SHOGO: Mobile Armor Division. In order to open a security gate, main character Sanjuro must retrieve a lost cat for the woman who owns the gate. In order to get the cat, he has to retrieve her favourite toy, a squeaky toy made in the likeness of Nathaniel Claw. When the toy is used, it says "Magic Claw", which is what Captain Claw says when he uses his magic.
